definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels

sentences.english: The year before, 2, 295 square kilometers (1, 426 square miles) were destroyed over that time period.
sentences.chinese: 在上一个年度，有2295平方公里的森林被毁。

sentences.english: The island has an area of 14 sq. km.
sentences.chinese: 这个岛的面积是14平方公里。

sentences.english: Right now, the average density of population on Earth is 25/km2.
sentences.chinese: 现在，地球上的人口密度是每平方公里二十五人。

sentences.english: Xingwen Karst Geopark, covering roughly 156 square kilometers, is made up of four scenic areas;
sentences.chinese: 兴文喀斯特地质公园占地约为156平方公里。

sentences.english: When full, the reservoir will cover an area of over 190 square kilometres.
sentences.chinese: 当水库满的时候，其占地超过190平方公里。

sentences.english: Shanghai has a total area of about 6,340 square kilometers.
sentences.chinese: 上海总面积大约有六千三百四十多平方公里。

sentences.english: It has a standard of living that is very high, and yet its average population density is 400/km2.
sentences.chinese: 其人口密度每平方公里400人，但生活水平却很高。

sentences.english: Changning District is located in the west of downtown Shanghai and covers an area of 38 square km.
sentences.chinese: 长宁区位于上海市中心区西部，面积38平方公里。

sentences.english: The Sanxingdui Ruins Site covers a vast area of about 12 square kilometres.
sentences.chinese: 三星堆遗址占地面积很广，约有12平方公里。

sentences.english: The company developed a project in Kunshan total area of 12 square kilometers.
sentences.chinese: 该公司制定了一个项目，在昆山总面积12平方公里。

sentences.english: Result showed that the home range of the wolves in Dalai Lake is 112 square kilometers.
sentences.chinese: 结果显示达赉湖地区狼的家域为112平方公里。

sentences.english: County a total area of 937 square km.
With 40 lakes which extend five kilometers along a valley, the spot covers an area of three square kilometers.
sentences.chinese: 四十个海子沿山谷绵亘五公里，幅员三平方公里。

sentences.english: The island of Manhattan has almost 26,000 people per square kilometer of land.
sentences.chinese: 曼哈顿岛每平方公里几乎有2万6千人。

sentences.english: It has a total catchment area of 17 square kilometres.
sentences.chinese: 屯门河集水区的总面积为17平方公里。

sentences.english: 700 square kilometres of sea are suitable for seafood farming.
sentences.chinese: 适宜海产品养殖的面积达2700平方公里。

definition: size (i.e. area) of a country, geographical region or school campus etc/(fig.) scope/extent
area (of a floor, piece of land etc)/surface area/tract of land
floor area/occupied area/footprint (of a building, piece of equipment etc)
to govern/to control/having jurisdiction over/linchpin of a wheel (archaic)/noise of a barrow
